lines.text: Well, we didn't find any sticker sheets for <c=#FF6000>Reversing Rune,</c> did we?
Uh, no. What's your angle, here?
Maybe... they did have a bunch of those, right? Stacks and stacks of 'em!
You're sayin' that's what went up in flames?
Sure! It'd explain why we didn't find any, right?
That's... a lot of sticker sheets, though. What on God's green earth would they be doin' with that many?
And what's up with <c=#FF00FF>that wire?</c> What would it be doin' mixed up with stickers?
Okay, okay, we'll table the sticker idea for now.
But I want points for thinking outside the box, okay?
Sure. Points. A thing this game has. Take as many as you want.
